programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: A series of spectacular evil crimes has risen and former super-villain Gru has been recruited to find out who is responsible for them.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: After stumbling upon a cute cat-dog-rabbit creature hybrid, or 'Cadobbit', Ben ignores Grandpa Max's advice and sneaks the animal onto the Rustbucket, but is soon in over his head as it turns on him.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: Ben and Billy Billions go head-to-head over a Sumo Slammer Set sold exclusively inside the world's largest shopping centre, only to find six-year-old Simon Sez has gotten to it first.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: Aboard the SS Pettigrew on its final voyage, Ben must battle seasickness as well as Steam Smythe, who looks to use his mechanical creatures to sink the steamship's modern replacement.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: With new Omni-Enhancements in tow, Ben plans on saving a town from a sudden mudslide, but his heroics are short-lived once Vilgax appears to warn him about the Omnitrix's mysterious new alien.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: After discovering that Vilgax has joined forces with the Weatherheads, Ben must not only overcome his doubts, but must also fully embrace his new powers if he is to beat his foes.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: When their attempt to get a photo with every storefront mascot is foiled, Ben and Gwen sneak out to get a snap with a wooden bear totem known as 'Yawk' only to find all the mascots have come to life.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: When a cavity forces Ben to consult a dentist, his day gets worse when the mean magician Hex uses a dreamcatcher to bring Ben's fears to life and transports them both to a nightmarish dreamscape.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: When the Rustbucket must have a tune-up in the same town as Zombozo's latest campaign trail stop, Ben discovers the clown is using his speeches to hypnotise and rob the town.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: As the Tennysons dig up dinosaur fossils in the Badlands, Ben is unaware that Vilgax and Dr. Amino have teamed up to steal alien DNA from the Omnitrix. Vilgax then double-crosses his fellow villain.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: During a live feed of the new transcontinental bullet train, La Grange enters the picture to outrace the train, but Ben joins in on the fun and will stop at nothing to come out on top!

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: After Max dozes off before a double feature, Ben and Gwen are left to save the drive-in on their own when evil magician Hex brings the film monster 'That' to life and unleashes it on the cinemagoers.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen engage in a highly competitive paper airplane war, but when alien-tech drones bombard the Rustbucket, they must work together to foil the aerial attack and find out who's behind it.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: Ben takes a detour on a jungle cruise during a trip to Adrenaworld West and finds himself hunted by the evil Tim Buktu. Ben must outwit Tim Buktu if he wants to make it off the theme park ride alive.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: The Tennyson trio uncovers Steam Smythe's steam-powered generator during a sightseeing trip at the Geyser Gulch National Park, and must shut it down before it overloads the power grid.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: When Gwen enters a pancake-eating contest at the world-famous Pancake Palace, Ben spots the Bugg Brothers and must stop them before they obtain an endless supply of what fuels their creations.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: Max takes a driving test to renew his licence, but when a disguised Zombozo hijacks the role of instructor, Ben becomes an alien to stop the evil clown and save their family road trip.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: As Team Tennyson leaves the Frozen Man Festival, Lord Decibel takes centre stage to threaten the festival-goers, vowing to create an avalanche if his ransom isn't paid.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen spend the day volunteering at Repto Ranch and come face-to-face with King Koil. They need to overcome their fear of snakes quickly if they are to defeat the slithery baddie.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: With the Rustbucket stopped on the Midwest roadside, Ben locks himself inside with his tablet as Max and Gwen enjoy the great outdoors, until Team Tennyson is pulled into a wild Jack-a-Lope chase.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: While on a tour at a space museum, Ben's excitement multiplies when he learns that some recently discovered 'space stuff' is being examined inside the museum's lab.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: During a trip to the Lake of the Ozarks, Ben and Gwen squabble over Ben's 'half-birthday' celebration, but when Max gets word of a suspicious rockslide, the cousins must put aside their differences.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: Left to entertain himself as Max takes a well-deserved nap, Ben stumbles upon a Xingo arcade game and goes OE-Shock Rock to power it up, but it, unfortunately, receives too much juice.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: While Gwen listens to a lecture on the Transcontinental Railroad, Ben sneaks away to the gift shop. When the Bounty Hunters appear and corner Ben, Gwen must use what she learnt to help him escape.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: As Max attempts to get Ben and Gwen to the Four Corners Monument before sunset, an ominous fog bank engulfs the roadway and forces Max to drive at a snail's pace.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: It's a play date afternoon in Toy Green and everyone is there having fun. Noddy has got a new ball for Bumpy to replace his old one that went missing. But when he finds the new ball burst in his secret cupboard he decides to investigate…. without letting Bumpy know what's happened. With Big Ears helping out by keeping Bumpy busy, Noddy and Revs are investigating against the clock to find out who burst the ball. When he finds Bumpy's original ball also burst and hidden in the kennel, he works out that the culprit is Bumpy himself! He hadn't wanted to tell anyone as he thought he'd get into trouble! Noddy reassures him that everything is okay and it's always better to tell the truth! Happily reassured, the little wooden dog happily starts playing again with his friends, using the burst ball as a Frisbee! Way to go, Noddy! Case Closed.

programme.title: Second Shot at Love
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed rational drinker who got diagnosed with alcohol dependency reunites with her alcohol-hating first love and takes on a sobriety challenge in this romance.

programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

With Boss Baby’s cover at stake, it’s up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib

With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard head to Scotland, where Odlulu is using the Strength Key to give her an advantage in the Highland Games. Wenda competes in the games alongside other Wanderers while Wally and Whitebeard try to get the key from an elusive Fritz!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Crocky has entrusted Raa Raa with his very special coconut to look after. Raa Raa does his very best to keep it safe. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: It's a play date afternoon in Toy Green and everyone is there having fun. Noddy has got a new ball for Bumpy to replace his old one that went missing. But when he finds the new ball burst in his secret cupboard he decides to investigate…. without letting Bumpy know what's happened. With Big Ears helping out by keeping Bumpy busy, Noddy and Revs are investigating against the clock to find out who burst the ball. When he finds Bumpy's original ball also burst and hidden in the kennel, he works out that the culprit is Bumpy himself! He hadn't wanted to tell anyone as he thought he'd get into trouble! Noddy reassures him that everything is okay and it's always better to tell the truth! Happily reassured, the little wooden dog happily starts playing again with his friends, using the burst ball as a Frisbee! Way to go, Noddy! Case Closed.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.title: Go Dog Go!

programme.title: Dali & Cocky Prince

In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: Ang Cute Ng Ina Mo

programme.title: Dos Ekis

programme.title: Hanggang Kailan?

programme.title: Abandonada

programme.title: Manila Kingpin (The Asiong Salonga Story)

programme.title: Ikaw Lamang
programme.desc: A charming, light-hearted tale about the ups and downs of growing up, and the joys and pains of young love.

programme.title: When Love Begins

programme.title: CSI S4 E03 - Homebodies
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

Asedillo is the role model of Simon (Conrad Poe). He becomes an active union official in the factory he is working for to lobby for workers' rights.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Today is George’s birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.desc: Four containers, straight from the Big Apple, make their way to Long Beach, CA. A can full of broken dummies generates some serious buzz, while a billionaire's unclaimed goods have everyone seeing dollar signs. Plus, a one-of-a-kind auction that includes the container itself.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 4
programme.desc: Bidders go head to head in a battle over some super heavyweight freight, a can filled to the brim with outdoor adventure equipment contains a unique surprise, and a tailgaters dream could stop its winner short of the goal line.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 5
programme.desc: The Israelis' go hard after what they think is vintage clothing, but will their fashion expertise pay off? Mo and Ty go postal when the doors swing open to reveal some mysterious machinery, and a custom container could land at least one buyer behindbars.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 6
programme.desc: The auction turns into a circus when four containers bound for Russia's Winter Games miss the boat. A waterlogged container piques everyone's interest, but can anything inside be salvaged? Plus, a Major League Baseball player gives Mo & Ty the lowdown on a state-of-the art piece of gym equipment

programme.title: Container Wars S3 7
programme.desc: The Israelis hang ten on a sweet beach can, but one surprise item may send them off the lot in search of major dollars. Plus, Jason strikes on a container full of wood and weird gear, but will his investment land him in the gutter? And later, a mystery door may check one team into a big loss.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 11
programme.desc: Sheldon unwillingly revisits some Christmas memories during a lively game of Dungeons and Dragons, while Raj joins the girls for ladies night out.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 12
programme.desc: Sheldon is accused of sexual harassment at the University and winds up dragging Leonard, Raj and Howard into the fray.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 13
programme.desc: Leonard's car is stolen when the guys take a road trip to a comic book convention in Bakersfield, dressed as Star Trek characters.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 14
programme.desc: Outraged that he’s being forced to work with university nemesis, Barry Kripke, Sheldon faces a crisis of conscience. Howard and Raj spend a thousand dollars on action figures of themselves.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 22
programme.desc: The sequel to Young Sheldon follows Georgie and Mandy as they raise their young family in Texas.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Your mind is the scene of the crime. Box-office superstar Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this contemporary science fiction action film set "within the architecture of the mind." Written, directed and produced by Oscar and Golden Globe nominee Christopher Nolan (The Dark Knight, Batman Begins, The Prestige), this eagerly awaited follow-up to 2008's billion-dollar blockbuster is yet another visionary tale from a startingly original filmmaker who continually raises the bar with every film he makes. Shooting in London, Paris, Tangiers, Calgary and Los Angeles, Nolan's mind-bending film also stars Academy Award winners Michael Caine and Marion Cotillard, in addition to Juno's Ellen Page, Batman Begins' Cillian Murphy and Oscar nominees Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai) and Tom Berenger (Platoon).

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 15
programme.desc: A fight between Leonard and Sheldon drives Leonard to finally move in with Penny – not realizing how the shift will affect Penny and Amy’s living arrangements.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 5
programme.desc: Feel the endorphin rush as 20 of the World's Dumbest Thrillseekers do their thing. We've got a motorcycle crash, an out of control skydiver, even an angry bison. And one thing ties them all together - outrageous fails. With hair-raising commentary from our cast of comedians, including Michael O'Gorman, Jared Logan and Judy Gold

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 6
programme.desc: Let the revelry begin as 20 of the most boneheaded partiers throw down. From twerking babes to an overzealous Willie Nelson fan and a drunken keg stand you can't un-see. Plus awesome commentary from our cast of comics, including Brendon Walsh, KevinMcCaffrey and Jaime Andrews

programme.desc: As John wonders what to do with a pile of old Schwinn parts, Jimmy decides to transform it into a custom Pee Wee-inspired bike

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 5

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 6
programme.desc: A gang of extreme jumpers nets the Direstas a commissioned Harley-inspired pogo stick sale.

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 8
programme.desc: In addition to restoring an old dartboard, a rusty neon bar sign forces the guys to head to a buddy's shop to help bring it back to life.

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 9
programme.desc: Hoping that old toys bring new joy and lots of money, the Direstas attempt to create a giant Lite Brite coffee table.

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 10
programme.desc: An auto junkyard inspires the guys to turn some rusted American classics into crisp American dollars.

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 11
programme.desc: Resurrecting an old coffin purchased from a dying store, John and Rat Boy make a grave decision and leave Jimmy six feet under.

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 12
programme.desc: The Direstas quickly learn that money does grow on trees as they stumble across a concrete forest.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 1
programme.desc: Former boxer Brandon Bernier and his wife Lori target the best storage units in America and then to go to any lengths to get their hands on what's stashed inside.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 2

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. programme.desc: A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.

programme.title: Karikal Mahal: A Silent Witness
programme.desc: The story of a mysterious mansion, Karikal Mahal in early 1900s Singapore that looked like a palace with its lake, fountains and bungalows on sprawling grounds the size of two-and-a-half football fields.

programme.title: Insight

programme.title: Life, Unexpected

programme.title: Money Mind
programme.desc: Money Mind is all about how to save, how to invest, and how to better spend your money. The show brings you weekly personal finance tips to help you make all the right money moves in Asia. Because, personal finance matters.

programme.title: Asia First
programme.desc: (Live) Top stories, business news and market updates from across the region as Asia gears up for the day ahead.

programme.title: Addicted
programme.desc: A deadly convergence of Colombian cocaine, European drug syndicates, and homemade fentanyl is destroying lives and tearing communities apart.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: With a fresh approach to tackling the issues of the day, Talking Point investigates a current issue or event, offering different perspectives to local stories and reveals how it all affects you.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Secret Lives Of Livestreamers
programme.desc: In part two of the series, we continue to follow three livestreamers from China, Indonesia and Singapore, to find out what comes after the fame, and to see their struggles to stay on top.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Isolation
programme.desc: The story is inspired by a true event. Creighton whisks his wife away for a vacation on a remote island in the Bahamas to save their marriage, but finds themselves hunted down by modern day pirates instead. With no one to trust but each other, the couple is forced to work together and fight for their lives.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: Chain Mail
programme.desc: A chain mail is forwarded to a group of people - some pass it on while others ignore it. After one of them suddenly dies, a series of mysterious deaths follows. Sandra learns that the chain mail is cursed and decides to find the origin and mystery behind to stop the misfortune. Will she break the curse before it's too late?

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Dead Dicks
programme.desc: Richie is a suicidal young man who finds himself very much alive every time he kills himself, although there will be a dead body of him in his apartment after each suicide attempt. Richie’s sister comes to his rescue and discovers the piled up dead bodies in the house. What keeps bringing Richie back?

programme.title: 3AM

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: The last new participant, Kendra, embeds while Orion loses his cool with a CO. Accusations of stealing lead to chaos within the women's pod, and one participant seemingly gives up on the mission.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: The family of Miya Marcano share the agonising details of what happened around the beautiful 19-year-old's disappearance.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Travel blogger Carla Stefaniak went to Costa Rica to celebrate her 36th birthday. But when she was to arrive back home to Miami, her awaiting loved ones realised she never got on the plane.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Feisty Chiquita Tate grew up determined to make something of herself after being raised in poverty by a drug-addicted mom. Now a hard-working lawyer, the only thing missing in her life is a man.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A family faces off with violent attackers trying to rob their jewelry store; two young women flee from a driver out to get them on a terrifying road trip; convenience and crime collide at a bank ATM.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A gas station worker faces down the barrel of a gun and is ordered to empty her registers; a man running an errand goes on a high speed chase to elude carjackers.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: What begins as an open-and-shut case spins into a full-on investigation when a mother and son are found dead in their home. Was this a murder/suicide, or could someone else have been responsible?

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: Undercover ATF and DEA agents are reminded to never judge a book by its cover and to always be on their toes. Even small-time suspects have the potential to unleash terror.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Five women share their harrowing accounts of abduction and imprisonment. They discuss what happens when the news coverage dies down and how they've healed from the trauma they experienced.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When two separate cases run cold for women who have been abducted and murdered, it takes the courage of a third unsuspecting victim to unveil a killer hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: The remaining participants encounter obstacles while trying to fulfil their missions as drugs run rampant throughout PCDC, resulting in a full shakedown.

programme.title: Divertissement
programme.desc: Divertissement

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: A journey throughout the French-speaking world to explore every corner of the globe! In each country we meet francophones who present, in French, their culture, way of life and commitments. The programme also shines a spotlight on local projects that keep the French language alive, dynamic and constantly evolving.

programme.title: Gabon, L'Écrin Vert De L'Afrique
programme.desc: In the heart of Equatorial Africa, Gabon is a real paradise for nature lovers. With its primary forests, beaches lined with palm trees and national parks full of exceptional fauna, the country offers one of the greatest levels of biodiversity on the continent and preserves its rich ancestral traditions.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Rendez-Vous Au Parc
programme.desc: Created in 1914, this national park is the oldest Swiss park and is found in Engadine, in the canton of the Grisons. It is crisscrossed by a vast network of footpaths covering 100 kilometres and is an ideal place to contemplate nature, but be sure to take a map.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Un Dimanche À La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Goutte D'Or
programme.desc: Rames, a crafty fraudster with a certain talent for dramatisation, runs a successful clairvoyance practice in the Goutte d'Or district in Paris. Up until a gang of street children arrives and starts to spreads terror there: the fake witchdoctor is going to have his first real vision.

programme.title: Mère De Ma Mère
programme.desc: Confronted with the emotional difficulties of a mother in distress, 12 year-old Djenaba, takes on a parental role to protect her.

programme.title: Fraîche
programme.desc: At the age of 58 and at the head of a literary programme on the radio, Anne leads a settled and peaceful family life. Until the day she attacks a young woman with incredible violence simply because she offers Anne her seat on the metro.

programme.title: Romy Schneider Face À Son Destin
programme.desc: Romy Schneider (1938-1982): an actress who leaves no-one indifferent, her beauty admired equally by men and women, her delicate fragility and a talent often deemed to be immense. We look back at the career of a perfectionist who lived her roles with passion, a great romantic forever blessed by life.

programme.title: Le Terminus Des Prétentieux
programme.desc: In 2020, to coincide with the 100th anniversary of the Michel Audiard's birth, Gaumont opens its archives, revealing the author's lesser-known works. ''Le Terminus des Prétentieux'', a title invented for many of his unfinished works, looks back over the life and work of one of France's most prolific dialogue writers.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Wildlive - Expéditions Sauvages
programme.desc: A naturalist, film-director, photographer and technician travel through Guiana for a veritable immersion in a natural wilderness, the Kaw wetlands. An expedition rich in both colour and emotion, guided by the Amerindian naturalist Kulanon Appolinaire, who recounts the delicate biological balances and the challenges involved in maintaining them.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Les Maîtres Du Piment
programme.desc: Whether they come from Espelette, Korea or the West Indies, chilli peppers have very different personalities. Even if they seem similar, each has their own unique taste and heat level. From India to Thailand, the chefs reveal their secrets to showcase a veritable wealth of flavour.

programme.title: Roumanie, Le Charme Des Balkans
programme.desc: On the southern fringes of Eastern Europe, francophone and francophile, Romania remains little known. Yet, in the heart of its sublime landscapes, its people have succeeded in keeping their culture and traditions alive. From architectural heritage to natural parks, Romania is a land of untold surprises to explore.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: La Suisse Des Lacs
programme.desc: In the autumn Switzerland's lakes don the most vibrant shades of gold. Whether on the lakes of the Bernese Oberland, Lake Maggiore or in the Trois-Lacs-Jura region, everyone lives in harmony with the season.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: Hélène Cochet, biologist specialising in mariculture, has been studying the European flat oyster for twenty years, the combat of her life. The only oyster native to France, yet virtually unknown to the general public. In a generation it has become forgotten, gradually replaced by the Pacific oyster from Asia. Report by: Nicolas Brikké, Chloë Ledoux.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Belle Vie
programme.desc: Julien sets off to the Lower Saint Lawrence to meet Rémi, Noémie and their little daughter Au-rélie, and discover their lifestyle. Skilled wood-workers, today they occupy the house they built themselves and are able to live on the money their art brings in.

programme.title: Haïti, La Rançon De L'Indépendance
programme.desc: 1804. Haiti is the first modern nation to gain its independence, thanks to a slave revolt. But France imposed a colossal debt on its former colony, condemning it to poverty and chronic under-development: political instability, food crises and violence ensued. This ransom continues to haunt the present-day situation.
